titles.title: Secure Rural and Tribal Lands Act
Secure Rural and Tribal Lands Act
To amend title VI of the Social Security Act to improve the Local Assistance and Tribal Consistency Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Secure Rural and Tribal Lands Act
This bill specifies the factors to be considered when allocating funding from the Local Assistance and Tribal Consistency Fund (a general revenue enhancement program that provides additional assistance to eligible counties and tribal governments for any governmental purpose except lobbying).
